TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示充当子元素集合的可滚动容器的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that act as scrollable containers for a collection of child elements.
The children of this element support .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅[Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)有关的可能实现此控件模式的控件示例。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含控件模式中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用来获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用属性及其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: 获取此 的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含此控件模式的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须是从与以获取当前值的引用。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用获取，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取任何属性的当前值引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用以获取以前使用指定的属性的缓存的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用属性及其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontallyScrollableProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在以下示例中，根元素传递给一个函数，返回一系列[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素的子代的根并符合一系列属性条件。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalScrollPercentProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在以下示例中，根元素被传递给一个函数，返回的内容区域内的可视区域的当前水平和垂直滚动百分比。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalViewSizeProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在以下示例中，根元素被传递给返回为整体的总内容区域百分比表示的可视区域的当前垂直和水平大小的函数。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

span.span: Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 可以将-1 的值替换为字段。The value -1 can be substituted for the field. ## Examples 在以下示例中，控件模式的均来自，然后用于滚动内容区域的顶部与可查看的区域。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Scroll (System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount horizontalAmount, System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount verticalAmount);
.method public hidebysig instance void Scroll(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount horizontalAmount, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount verticalAmount) cil managed
Public Sub Scroll (horizontalAmount As ScrollAmount, verticalAmount As ScrollAmount)

param.name: horizontalAmount
param.span: 特定于控件的水平增量。

span.span: The horizontal increment specific to the control.

param.span: 如果不能在此方向上滚动控件，则应传入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

param.name: verticalAmount
param.span: 特定于控件的垂直增量。

span.span: The vertical increment specific to the control.

param.span: 如果不能在此方向上滚动控件，则应传入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

summary.span: 水平和垂直滚动内容区域的可见区域。

span.span: Scrolls the visible region of the content area horizontally and vertically.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，控件模式的均来自然后用于水平或垂直滚动的元素所请求的量。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the element a requested amount either horizontally or vertically. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#106)]

exception.span: 控件仅支持用于水平或垂直滚动的 值，但传入了 值。

span.span: A control supports values exclusively for horizontal or vertical scrolling but a value is passed in.

exception.span: 尝试在不支持的方向上滚动。

span.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetScrollPercent (double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetScrollPercent(float64 horizontalPercent, float64 verticalPercent) cil managed
Public Sub SetScrollPercent (horizontalPercent As Double, verticalPercent As Double)
public: void SetScrollPercent(double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);

param.name: horizontalPercent
param.span: 总水平内容区域的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total horizontal content area.

param.span: 如果不能在此方向上滚动控件，则应传入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

param.name: verticalPercent
param.span: 总垂直内容区域的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total vertical content area.

param.span: 如果不能在此方向上滚动控件，则应传入 。

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

summary.span: 以 内总内容区域百分比的形式设置水平和/或垂直滚动位置。

span.span: Sets the horizontal and/or vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当该控件的内容区域的可见区域比大时，此方法才有用。This method is only useful when the content area of the control is larger than the visible region. 传入值表示没有指定方向不滚动。Passing in the value indicates that there is no scrolling in the specified direction. ## Examples 在以下示例中，控件模式的均来自，然后用于滚动内容区域的顶部左侧主页位置与可查看的区域。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top left 'home' position of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: 传入无法转换成双精度的值。

span.span: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.

exception.span: 传入了大于 100 或小于 0 的值（-1 除外，因为它等效于 ）。

span.span: A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to ).

exception.span: 和 值被规范化为 0% 或 100%。

span.span: The and values are normalized to either 0% or 100%.

exception.span: 尝试在不支持的方向上滚动。

span.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
